snippet.title: Shin chan: Shiro and the Coal Town - Launch Date Trailer | Coming 24 October to Switch and Steam
snippet.description:
Shin chan: Shiro and the Coal Town is launching on October 24th, 2024 on Steam and Nintendo Switch (Digital Version)!

Official Website:
https://bit.ly/3LvoUoA

Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2699820/

Official X (Formerly Twitter):
https://x.com/shinchan_summer
 
In Shin chan: Shiro and the Coal Town, Shin-chan and the Nohara family visit the town of Akita. The game depicts Shin-chan's daily life as he and Shiro experience various things while travelling between the two worlds of reality and a mysterious town. The game can be enjoyed by people of all ages and genders, from "Crayon Shin-chan" fans to video game fans who want to experience a full-fledged story.
The Nintendo Switch logo and Nintendo Switch are trademarks of Nintendo.
